facebook.title: Science and Mathematics
facebook.summary: Today, 12th Aug, we commemorate the birthday of an eminent physicist. He is none other than Erwin Schrödinger, who was born in 1887 in Vienna. Schrödinger's famous wave equation, for which he was awarded the 1933 Nobel physics prize, was a significant mile
